bibl.title: The Imperial Chamber at Luxor.
bibl.note: The Diocletianic Castrum. - The Painted Chamber. - The Frescoes. - The Procession on the Walls. - The Adventus at Luxor (The West Wall; - The Roman Pompa triumphalis; - Diocletian in Egypt; - The Komasia). - The Concord of the Emperors. - Conclusion.
Kalavrezou-Maxeiner Ioli, The Imperial Chamber at Luxor.
DOP 29 (1975) pp. 225-251, 1 plan et 14 pll. n./bl. et coul.
